name: In the Loupe
description:
Join the young witch Linette, as she explores the forest! Use her special loupe to reveal the hidden secrets the magical forest has to offer -- the magic is In the Loupe!

In the Loupe is a  relaxing exploration game where you walk around the forest, looking for magical items which shift your perception of the world as you look through the loupe. See if you can wake up from this eerie dream experience.

Controls:
WASD/Arrow keys to move
Mouse for camera controls
Right Mouse Button to look through the Loupe
Left Mouse Button to interact with objects when looking through the Loupe

As a player, you are looking for magical items which shift your perception of the world as you look through the loupe. You walk around a forest and hope to wake up from this dream.
